lejos.robotics.geometry

Class Line2D.Float

  • java.lang.Object
    • lejos.robotics.geometry.Line2D
      • lejos.robotics.geometry.Line2D.Float
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Shape
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Line
    Enclosing class:
    Line2D

    public static class Line2D.Float
extends Line2D
    A line in 2D space using float coordinates
